name: Bad Dream: Memories
summary:
Bad Dream is a series of short point&click games which action takes place in creepy, dark and sad land of dream. Some of games will be a cruel and painful as nightmare, and some will be disturbing and illogical. Gameplay will always look the same, but the dreams will be different. Each game will take around 20 minutes of gameplay (for the first time). 
 
Bad Dream: Butcher is a short point&click game placed in the dream world. Gameplay is short, but quite disturbing/scary. 
 
Bad Dream episodes: 
 
-Part 01: Butcher 
 
-Part 02: Graveyard 
 
-Part 03: Hospital 
 
-Part 04: Cyclops 
 
-Part 05: Memories 
 
-Part 06: Bridge
